ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of KEVIN D'SOUZA of Langley, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Pacific Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period beginning on June 15, 2018 and ending on November 5, 2020.
